title: 11/04: Injury Updates; In-Depth Look at the RB Position (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We've got Dr. Brandon Bowers on to give us some projected timetables for Jacoby Brissett, James Conner, Adam Thielen and more. Then Will Brinson joins the show (5:45) as he and Adam talk RBs! How does the position look compared to 2018? How highly do we value Josh Jacobs (13:40)? Can you trust Ronald Jones (21:30)? We then talk about A.J. Green's rest of season value (26:00) and get into a common Fantasy Football conundrum that might not have a solution (29:40).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Updating you on the major injuries and then discussing some Fantasy Football hot topics as we take a midseason look at the RB position.
